attributes.action: I want more opportunities for young people in our society.
attributes.background: I feel that our society has little opportunities for young people. Nowadays there are few opportunities for young people to express themselves and expand their learning further than in school. To be a forward looking society, to be one with lower crime rates and happier young people this could work.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to create more opportunities for young people.
